generic <typename TResult> public value class ValueTask : IEquatable<System::Threading::Tasks::ValueTask<TResult>>
.class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit ValueTask`1<TResult> extends System.ValueType implements class System.IEquatable`1<valuetype System.Threading.Tasks.ValueTask`1<!TResult>>

span.span: The result.

summary.span: 提供包装 和 （仅使用其中之一）的值类型。

span.span: Provides a value type that wraps a and a , only one of which is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的实例可以使用 等待或转换为 。A instance may either be awaited or converted to a using . 实例只能等待一次，并且在实例完成之前，使用者不能读取 。A instance may only be awaited once, and consumers may not read until the instance has completed. 如果这些限制不可接受，请通过调用 将 转换为 。If these limitations are unacceptable, convert the to a by calling . 永远不应对 实例执行以下操作：The following operations should never be performed on a instance: - 等待实例多次。Awaiting the instance multiple times. - 多次调用 。Calling multiple times. - 在操作尚未完成或多次使用时，使用 `.Result` 或 `.GetAwaiter().GetResult()`。Using `.Result` or `.GetAwaiter().GetResult()` when the operation hasn't yet completed, or using them multiple times. - 使用多种方法来使用此实例。Using more than one of these techniques to consume the instance. 如果执行上述任一操作，则结果是不确定的。If you do any of the above, the results are undefined. 如果某个方法可能会以同步方式使用其操作的结果，并且应经常调用该方法，从而导致为每个调用分配新 的成本是不受支持的，则该方法可能返回此值类型的实例。A method may return an instance of this value type when it's likely that the result of its operation will be available synchronously, and when it's expected to be invoked so frequently that the cost of allocating a new for each call will be prohibitive. 使用 而不是 有一些折衷。There are tradeoffs to using a instead of a . 例如，虽然在成功结果可同步使用的情况下， 有助于避免分配，但它还包含多个字段，而 作为引用类型是单个字段。For example, while a can help avoid an allocation in the case where the successful result is available synchronously, it also contains multiple fields, whereas a as a reference type is a single field. 这意味着从方法返回 会导致复制更多数据。This means that returning a from a method results in copying more data. 这也意味着，如果返回 的方法在异步方法中等待，则该异步方法的状态机将更大，因为它必须存储一个包含多个字段的结构，而不是一个引用。It also means, that if a method that returns a is awaited within an async method, the state machine for that async method will be larger, because it must store a struct containing multiple fields instead of a single reference. 除了使用 await 来使用异步操作的结果以外， 可能会导致更复杂的编程模型，需要更多分配。For uses other than consuming the result of an asynchronous operation using await, can lead to a more convoluted programming model that requires more allocations. 例如，请考虑一个方法，该方法可能会以缓存任务的方式返回 作为常见结果或 。For example, consider a method that could return either a with a cached task as a common result or a . 如果结果使用者想要将它用作 或 等方法中的 ，则必须首先使用 将 转换为 ，从而导致在第一次使用缓存 时可以避免的分配。If the consumer of the result wants to use it as a in a method like or , the must first be converted to a using , leading to an allocation that would have been avoided if a cached had been used in the first place. 因此，任何异步方法的默认选择都应该是返回 或 。As such, the default choice for any asynchronous method should be to return a or . 仅当性能分析证明它值得时，才应使用 而不是 。Only if performance analysis proves it worthwhile should a be used instead of a . 大多数情况下，不建议 的非泛型版本。The non generic version of is not recommended for most scenarios. 属性应该用于在返回 的方法同步成功完成的情况下，手动返回已成功完成的单一实例。The property should be used to hand back a successfully completed singleton in the case where a method returning a completes synchronously and successfully. > [!NOTE] > 支持从C# 7.0 开始使用 类型，且 Visual Basic 的任何版本都不支持该类型。The use of the type is supported starting with C# 7.0, and is not supported by any version of Visual Basic.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性只能访问一次，且仅在此 完成后才可以访问。This property may only be accessed once, and only after this has completed. 如果此 成功完成，则此属性将返回结果值。If this has completed successfully, this property returns the resulting value. 如果此 出错，则此属性将引发异常。If this has faulted, this property raises an exception. 引发的异常不会包装在 中。The thrown exception is not wrapped in an .
